text: Ingmāra Balode Ingmāra Balode (born 1981 in Auce, Latvia), is a Latvian poet and translator. ==Bibliography== ===Poetry=== * Ledenes, ar kurām var sagriezt mēli (2007) * alba (2012) ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century Latvian poets Category:Latvian translators Category:Latvian women writers Category:Latvian women poets Category:21st- century Latvian women writers
title: Ingmāra Balode
